title: Reboot!
author: verias
text:
Hidden Names: Jim & Ali

So, who remembers that show? This page made me think of it briefly.

This space reserved for J banter!

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Not by the Tin Can, but by the VERY Pissed off Dog-boy,Elf-Girl,Human and Cyber-Fairy standing behind you.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text:
Well, I went thinking about dr. Who and now I can't stop imagining the surgeon speaking like a Dalek.
E-LIM-IN-ATE!!!
